message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $11000 for this valuable item.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can we meet in the middle?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your input and am willing to consider a price closer to your suggestion. My counteroffer is $10500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to consider my previous suggestion. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can we meet in the middle again?
I understand your position, Bob. Let me see if I can adjust the price further. My counteroffer is now $9800 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. Can we meet in the middle once again?
Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9400 for the product.
I'm getting close to a deal, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can we meet in the middle one last time?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Let me see if I can lower the price slightly more. My final counteroffer is $9250 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I can only go up to $9000. That's my final offer.
